Desc.entry: A registered charity and voluntary organisation which aims to relieve the distress and suffering of people in Sheffield who have suffered or are exposed to domestic abuse by offering counselling and advocacy. Also aims to educate the general public in the causes and prevention of domestic abuse and to undertake or contribute to research into such matters. Provides telephone and face-to-face practical and emotional support, training to staff, volunteers, clients, community groups and other agencies. Also encourages people to take back their lives through confidence building etc. Offers support to abused men as well as women. Now also runs a project working with perpetrators of abuse called the Janus Project (see separate entry). Also has a new project which works with children and young people affected by domestic abuse, Sheaf Childrens Support Service (see separate entry). Self or any referral.
